name: Staff of Homa
desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

values.desc: HP increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <color=#99FFFFFF>0.8%</color> of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>1%</color> of Max HP.

HP increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>25%</color>. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <color=#99FFFFFF>1%</color> of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>1.2%</color> of Max HP.

HP increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color>. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <color=#99FFFFFF>1.2%</color> of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>1.4%</color> of Max HP.

HP increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>35%</color>. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <color=#99FFFFFF>1.4%</color> of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>1.6%</color> of Max HP.

HP increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <color=#99FFFFFF>1.6%</color> of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional <color=#99FFFFFF>1.8%</color> of Max HP.
